definitions.definition: To cut into a surface with an acid or other corrosive substance in order to make a pattern . Best known as a technique for creating printing plates , but also used for decoration on metal , and, in modern industry , to make circuit boards .

examples: The memory of 9/11 is etched into my mind.

main_definition: To cut into a surface with an acid or other corrosive substance in order to make a pattern . Best known as a technique for creating printing plates , but also used for decoration on metal , and, in modern industry , to make circuit boards .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) To make a lasting impression .
